Section.name: About CRIT
Section.description:
Chiranjeevi Reddy Institute of Engineering And Technology (CRIT) was established in the year 2008 in Anantapur. The institute objective of promoting technical education in the backward region of Anantapur dist. The College campus is spread in 20 acres on the outskirts of Anantapur
